data.question: Why are neutral 2D MOFs preferred for exfoliation?
data.answer: Because the non-covalent bonding between layers allows exfoliation without disturbing the bonding within the layer

data.question: What is the role of van der Waals interactions in the structure of the 2D MOF [Dy(MeCOO)(PhCOO)2]n?
